question: Goura Chandra Mohapatra, who passed away recently, was the veteran freedom fighter of which state?
explanation: Goura Chandra Mohapatra (104), the veteran freedom fighter, educationist and social reformer, has passed away in Bhubaneswar, Odisha on September 11, 2018.  He actively participated in the freedom movement and  jailed during Quit India Movement in 1942. He dedicated his entire life for promotion of Gandhian values and for social upliftment. Mohapatra was the son of nationalist poet \'Kantakabi\' Laxmikanta Mohapatra, who penned the famous song \"Bande Utkal Janani\" .
